text:
The Shiv Sena on Wednesday attacked the BJP over the imposition of President’s Rule in Uttarakhand, accusing its ally of “strangling democracy”.

In an editorial in the Sena mouthpiece Saamana , the party warned that the BJP’s action may be repeated in the Congress-ruled States like Himachal Pradesh and Manipur, creating instability in the country. — IANS
title: Sena slams BJP
